page.title: 05HAYFIELD MILL
page.content: The mill employs 272 women and 212 men making many varied knitting yarns from wool,nylon,acrylic fibre and cotton. Maintenance staff includes engineers, fitters,joiners,plumbers and drivers. Most employees attend machines which spin,twist,wind,steam and dye the fibres.30 supervisors check the progress and efficiency of the operators.A design group led by a chief designer choose colours and styles and the attractive product is labelled and automatically packed before going into warehouse store. Production runs at Â£10 million per year or 35 tonnes per week and 90% goes into 6000 retail outlets in the UK whilst 10% goes to Canada,Australia ,Japan and Scandanavia.Computers are used in the administration and accounts departments for wages,stock control,finance & colour match....
